Item.Value: [Text:This is such a nice town, although it could do with more pink.][Name:1][Default]
[Text:I wonder if the Inn has anything sweet? My teeth have a craving.][Name:2][Default]
[Text:What kind of food do you like? Personally, I need flavor.][Name:3][Default]
[Text:I'd rather eat my boot than eat bland food. At least then there'd be a funny story.][Name:4][Default]
[Text:I wonder what kind of potions I can find here.][Name:5][Default]
